column1: Nala was in her room ready to sleep. Nala wants to have a good night's sleep without any nightmares. The door to Nala's room is locked. A purple butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Nala sees the purple butterfly.

Noah was at the airport, ready to travel to a modern city. Noah wanted to buy a snack before his flight. The wallet in Noah's bag was full of cash. A bird lands on Noah's shoulder. Noah sees the bird on his shoulder.
Hugo was in the park with his friends. Hugo wanted to win the kite flying contest. The string of Hugo's kite was strong. A squirrel runs by with a nut in its mouth. Hugo sees the squirrel.
Ravi was at the fish market. Ravi wanted to buy a fish for his mom to cook for dinner. The fish on the scale was heavy. A scared cat runs through the fish market. Ravi sees the scared cat.
Vito was at a birthday party. Vito wanted to give his friend a special gift. The gift was wrapped in a shiny paper. A clown comes into the room to perform a magic show. Vito sees the clown.
Tim was in the kitchen, ready to make lunch. Tim wanted to make a big bowl of pasta. The pasta box was full. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Tim sees the bird.
Wendy was in the park, sitting on a bench. Wendy wanted to play a charming tune on her small flute. The flute was in her bag. A squirrel runs up a tree nearby. Wendy sees the squirrel.
Gigi was at the park with her friends. Gigi wanted to share her mints with her friends. The mint box was full of fat, healthy mints. A rainbow appears in the sky. Gigi sees the rainbow.

Remy was in the park playing with his colorful parrot. Remy wanted his parrot to learn a new trick. The parrot was sitting on a clear and open branch. A squirrel runs across the park. Remy sees the squirrel running.
column2: The branch the parrot is sitting on.

column1: Pete was at the park, ready to eat his lunch. Pete wanted to enjoy his food while watching the birds. The food in Pete's lunch box was fresh and yummy. A patient dog sits down next to Pete, watching him. Pete sees the patient dog.
Quin was in the park with his gray paint and brush. Quin wanted to paint a big tree on a big balloon. The balloon was empty. A squirrel runs past Quin, carrying a nut. Quin sees the squirrel.
